name: user_medias
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_cheapest.
Tool description: 2023，Real-time and cheapest Instagram data API，raw json。user，media，hashtag。最便宜的instagram api
API description: Fetches media posts for a specified Instagram user.

user_id.description: The Instagram user ID for which to fetch media posts.

next_max_id.description: Pagination parameter for fetching the next set of media posts. Default is None.
